title: New: Seoul – Stay With Us
body:
Montreal trio **Seoul** have been racing up the Hype Machine lately with their debut track _Stay With Us_.

A dreamy, intoxicating number, it’s not hard to see what it’s currently racking up thousands of plays, and deservedly so. Whilst there appears to be a sudden flurry of very current sounding artists emerging, it’ll be mightily interesting to witness which can provide a form of sustainability. Check out _Stay With Us_ below.
